TopicTitle: About mods, any manager and any part organizer? [Ingame or Mac]

Articles.Content:
Hi guys!

My first post on the forums!

I've been playing KSP for a while and now I'm trying to play with some mods. Compared to other games it's very easy to install de majority of KSP mods but I'm wondering if there is any mod manager (for mac or ingame) to select witch mod is active or maybe even install or update the mods.

And another related question. Personally it's difficult to me to know what part I'm seeing when I'm making a ship. And when I added a couple of mods it's even more difficult to find the part that you need. Is there any part organizer? I wish Squad add this feature with custom tabs or subtabs. (the forge guys in Minecraft solved this very well).

Thanks!!

For KSP specific mod managers, there are KSP ModAdmin and KSP ModManager.

KSPMA: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/26031-Win-KSP-Mod-Admin-v1-3-6-Mod-install-with-2-klicks

KSPMM: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/13155-Win-With-Auto-Updater!-Kerbal-Space-Program-Mod-Manager

Another one that is NOT KSP specific, and is very basic, but I guess people use it, so it must work for KSP, is JSGME Generic Game Mod Enabler.

(Google that one, I have no link)

All three of those are separate programs that run outside of KSP.

As to in-game part organizers, there are also three or 4 of those.

Heres a couple:

Part Catalog: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/35018-0-21-PartCatalog-2-0-Big-overhaul-get-your-dynamic-subgroups-now

Part Group & Filter: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/35155-0-20-Part-Group-Filter

Simple Part Organizer: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/34779-0-21-Simple-Part-Organizer-%28v0-250

Theres a couple more, older ones, that I dont use because they havent been supported in quite awhile, but MAY work with 0.21+....

Hopefully someone will chime in with those...

Edited November 16, 2013 by Stone Blue

Thanks for the suggestions.

About the mod managers the problem is that I want it for Mac and those are for windows

And I will try the in-game organizers! thanks!
